front.title: •On Target
front.gametext: If you have a piloted capital starship armed with a starship weapon, use 2 Force to target an opponent's starship present. Until the end of your next turn, target cannot move and its pilots may not apply ability toward drawing battle destiny.
front.lore: Some Imperial starfighters are equipped with sensors, informing the pilot when an enemy craft has targeted him. The pilot's evasive maneuvers cost him time, but save his life.

counterpart: They've Shut Down The Main Reactor
